attributes.action: Scrap the Public duty costs allowance for ex Prime Ministers
attributes.additional_details: There is a cost of living crisis and a large turnover of Prime Ministers and this is unsustainably and unfair in the light of many struggling families and individuals. It’s obscene.
attributes.background: Stop allowing ex Prime Ministers from being paid up to £115,000 on top of their salary. https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/public-duty-cost-allowance/public-duty-costs-allowance-guidance

rejection.details: Abolish the Public Duties Cost Allowance (PDCA) for former Prime Ministers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625940
